reviews.customers_say: Customers find the tunic comfortable like a sweatshirt with sleeves that are long enough, and appreciate its unique design.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Shapely, stretchy, soft w/ functional pockets!
items.body: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS!! The design is Awesome, soft!, stretchy, and has pockets that are actually functional. Which you ladies know that's dang near impossible to find. For me it fit like a glove & didn't shrink as much as I thought it would, but I did follow instructions. I would've bought more or replaced my entire winter wear for these, but didn't have the money. Also, being apple shaped, I'm not into bright colors. Seriously, I can't wait to get them! THANK YOU! Read more
items.author: Dean Walker

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice!
items.body: I like the look and color of this top. The pockets are a nice addition as well. It washes well and is comfortable. Read more
items.author: SuperMom12

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Fall Top!
items.body: Perfect for fall, warm & cozy, great fit & feel. Nice weight without being too bulky. Great over leggings or jeans. Flattering as it drapes over problem areas & doesn’t cling. Love it!!! Will order more in different colors. Read more
items.author: Rosa Lee Ryan

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Shirt
items.body: I ordered this in black and really did love the style and the material. It fit well and I loved it. But after one wash, the black seemed to pick up every piece of dust or lint it encountered to the point I really couldn't wear it anymore. I'd order this again, just in a different color. Read more
items.author: OwenMom

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality!
items.body: Absolutely in love with this sweater!! Bright color, comfortable fabric, very well made and great quality. I only wish I ordered it sooner so I could have worn it longer Read more
items.author: Julie Shannon

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long and comfy
items.body: Light weight, comfortable and very long. I did need to go up a size due to it being snug across back and chest. I love the color and pattern Read more
items.author: peggy casey

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful product but check the size
items.body: I love the color and color fastness. The neckline is perfect. The material is lightweight compared to a sweatshirt and comfortable. Size runs small compared to other similar products. I wear an XL. However, I ordered a 3XL based on the size chart’s length. I figured I could take it up if needed. Well, the 3XL is a perfect fit. Who knew?! Read more
items.author: Dena Jennings

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My New Favorite Flattering Top!
items.body: I am absolutely in love with the Bulotus Women's Long Sleeve Cowl Neck Tunic! From the moment I put it on, I knew it was a winner. It's incredibly flattering to my curves and drapes beautifully. I've worn it several times now and without fail, I always receive compliments when I have it on. What I also appreciate is its versatility. It's so easy to dress up with some nice jewelry and dress pants for a more polished look. Alternatively, it looks just as great dressed down with leggings for a comfortable yet stylish everyday outfit. The cowl neck adds a touch of elegance, and the asymmetrical hem is a unique and fashionable detail. Plus, the pockets are a fantastic and practical addition! The material is comfortable to wear, and the long sleeves are perfect for cooler days. This tunic has quickly become a staple in my wardrobe, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a comfortable, flattering, and versatile top. You won't be disappointed! Read more
items.author: Alicia

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black, Dark Gray, Swallow Gird, Brick Red, Red Plaid, Black Purple Plaid-1, Leaf, Light Brown, Khaki Plaid-1, Blue, Red Black Plaid-1, Burgundy, Khaki Plaid, Purple Plaid. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
